timeline.message:
Fix WatcherRestartIT.testWatcherRestart

This commit adjusts testWatcherRestart to vary the template version number it
checks for based on the ES version being upgraded from, because the v11 template
is only installed on clusters with all nodes >=7.7.0.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
// v7.7.0 contains a Watch history template (version 11) that can't be used unless all nodes in the cluster are >=7.7.0, so
// v7.7.0 contains a Watch history template (version 11) that isn't used unless all nodes in the cluster are >=7.7.0, so
timeline.author: gwbrown
